youtube.title: How Hydrogen Peroxide Removes Blood Stains: Biology Explained
youtube.description: Discover the science behind the fizz! In this video, we show how hydrogen peroxide breaks down blood stains through a chemical reaction with the enzyme catalase. A perfect biology demonstration and a useful cleaning hack for everyday life. Subscribe for more science insights!
